snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry made an unannounced visit to consult King Abdullah II even as the Palestinian president restated positions that underscored the challenge Mr. Kerry faces.
abstract: Secretary of State John Kerry makes unannounced visit to Jordan to consult King Abdullah II about Israeli-Palestinian peace negotiations, even as Palestinian Authority Pres Mahmoud Abbas reiterates positions that underscore challenge Kerry faces.

byline.original: By JODI RUDOREN and MICHAEL R. GORDON
byline.contributor: Jodi Rudoren reported from Jerusalem, and Michael R. Gordon from Aqaba, Jordan. Fares Akram contributed research from Gaza.

lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry made an unannounced visit to consult King Abdullah II even as the Palestinian president restated positions that underscored the challenge Mr. Kerry faces.

headline.main: As Kerry Visits Jordan, Abbas Holds His Ground
headline.print_headline: As Kerry Visits Jordan, Abbas Holds His Ground
